summary: The diff implements fixes for PIX QR code display (REQ-1, REQ-2) but lacks evidence of CheckoutPage integration verification (REQ-3). The modified files show PixQrCodeDisplay component improvements and qrCodeGenerator implementation, but no CheckoutPage modifications are visible to verify payment provider integration.

missing_requirements.requirement: Check CheckoutPage integration with payment providers to ensure PIX QR code display is triggered correctly for both Gateway and PagBank payment flows
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to CheckoutPage component are visible in the diff. The requirement specifically asks to verify integration with Gateway and PagBank providers, but no changes to the checkout page integration logic are present.
